I know this sounds very stupid, but where is the crack? Also, where do you extact the Group's? (ex. group 1, group 2 , group 3 .. ect)

It's a decent game guys, although I serverly disagree with the Devs saying it's "The most realistic Racer ever" (They've clearly never heard of rFactor or GTR) because it's not realistic at all, really, the Physics don't seem to be that much different from the first, which wasn't realistic.

Another problem is I think they actually downgraded the graphics, I'm running it at Full with 1920x1200, 2xAA, 8xAF (Which is what I run NFS-Shift at) and it looks worse than there first game.

I though it might just be PC, so I looked up some Console gameplay and it looks the same on Consoles, it might be an improvement for Consoles maybe, but it looks terrible compared to the first one on PC.

Maybe they'll release a Patch which will add better graphics? Doubt it.

They do need a Patch, though, I get 60FPS solid on NFS-Shift Patched, but on this I get about 40 - 50FPS, so they need to do what they done with NFS-Shift and release a Patch to improve performance for NFS-Shift 2.

Over all, a good game, nothing particularly new and improved from the first (If anything, downgraded, because of the graphics) but it's still a decent game, NFS-Shift Series is fun, so it's always worth a play, but in its current condition, I'd rather stick to NFS-Shift, that is, until they Patch it, if they Patch it, rather.

Installation Guide -

1. Download Torrent.

2. Mount ISO (I use Power ISO).

3. Install game.

4. When prompted to Activate the game, choose Cancel and let it finish Installing.

5. Download a Crack (You can get one off Skidrow's Website)

6. Copy & Paste Crack into Need For Speed Shift 2 Unleashed Directory.

7. Play the game.


If anyone has any problems or didn't understand, say so, and I will try to help.

Thanks.

Shift 2 Unleashed Minimum System Requirements:

Required - Internet Connection
OS - Windows XP (SP3) / Vista (SP2)/ Windows 7
Processor - Intel CoreTM2 Duo 2.0 GHz / AMD X2 64 2.4GHz
Memory - 2.0 GB
Hard Drive - 7 GB
DVD Drive - 8x SPEED
Video Card - DirectX 9.0c Compatible 3D-accelerated 512 MB video card with Shader Model 3.0 or higher
Sound Card - DirectX 9.0c compatible
DirectX - Version 9.0c
Online Multiplayer - 512 Kbps or faster; 2-12 Players
Input - Keyboard, Mouse, Supported Game Controllers
Optional - USB Steering Wheel / Dual Analogue Gamepad

*Supported chipsets: ATI HD3 Series or greater; NVIDIA GeForce 8 Series or higher or greater

Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required.

EA Download Manager Users require 8.16 GB additional space for temporary installation files

*NOTE - To install the game properly on Windows XP/Windows Vista/7, you will need administrator access to your machine

Okay,

First the install was easy just extract the iso and remove the crack from the extracted folder. Mount the iso using Alcohol 120% or something. Go to my computer and open the iso that has been mounted and run AutoRun.exe and install. When it asks for a serial just press cancel and the installation will finish like normal. When the install has finished un-tick the box that says EaDownloader or whatever it's called. Press finish. Copy the contents of the crack folder that you removed from the extracted iso and put it in the shift2 install file in the c drive. Then go back to my computer and open up the mounted iso and click auto run. Also block the program from accessing the internet. The game worked perfect for me this way. Smooth game play and okay graphics but the actual game is a FUCKING PILE OF SHIT. I would recommend trying another game but +1 to AiTB for providing another good torrent :)
